querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS AppNo, A.APP_ID AS AppId, AG.NUM_OF_ASSET AS NumOfAsset, AG.AGRMNT_NO AS AgrmntNo, AG.AGRMNT_ID AS AgrmntId, AG.TENOR AS Tenor, AG.CUST_NAME AS CustName, AFD.MR_INTEREST_TYPE_CODE AS MrInterestTypeCode, AG.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, AG.PROD_OFFERING_CODE AS ProdOfferingCode, AG.PROD_OFFERING_VERSION AS ProdOfferingVersion, AFD.MR_INST_SCHEME_CODE AS MrInstSchemeCode, RMA.DESCR AS MrInterestTypeName, RMB.DESCR AS MrInstSchemeName, E.MOU_CUST_NO AS MouCustNo, E.MOU_CUST_ID AS MouCustId, StatDescr.DESCR AS Stat, CurrStepDescr.DESCR AS CurrStep, LastStepDescr.DESCR AS LastStep
querystring.from: FROM DBO.APP A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DBO.AGRMNT AG WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AG.APP_ID LEFT JOIN DBO.AGRMNT_FIN_DATA AFD WITH(NOLOCK) ON AG.AGRMNT_ID = AFD.AGRMNT_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMA ON RMA.MASTER_CODE = AFD.MR_INTEREST_TYPE_CODE AND RMA.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INTRSTTYPE' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMB WITH(NOLOCK) ON RMB.MASTER_CODE = AFD.MR_INST_SCHEME_CODE AND RMB.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INST_SCHM' LEFT JOIN dbo.MOU_CUST E ON E.MOU_CUST_ID = A.MOU_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS StatDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_STAT = StatDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND StatDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND StatDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STAT' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS CurrStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_CURR_STEP = CurrStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND CurrStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND CurrStepDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STEP' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_STATUS LastStepDescr WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_LAST_STEP = LastStepDescr.REF_STATUS_CODE AND LastStepDescr.TRX_TYPE_CODE = 'LOS_CRD_PRC' AND LastStepDescr.STATUS_GRP_CODE = 'APP_STEP'
